sentences.en: "Mum thinks I should stop imposing on your hospitality, Leo," said Grace.
sentences.cn: “利奥，我妈妈觉得我不应该再在这儿麻烦你了，”格雷丝说。

sentences.en: "Yes, Mum," replied Cheryl as she slowly put away her doll.
sentences.cn: “是的，妈妈。”谢里尔一边慢慢地收起布娃娃一边回答。

sentences.en: He is keeping mum about his feelings on the matter.
sentences.cn: 他闭口不谈他对此事的个人感受。

sentences.en: he was keeping mum about a possible move to West Ham.
sentences.cn: 他对可能搬到西哈姆一事不发一言。

sentences.en: I have understood my mum. She has done all the things for the sake of me.
sentences.cn: 现在我对未来充满了信心，我理解了妈妈，她所做的一切都是为了我。

sentences.en: I love sweets but Mum doesn't let me have them very often.
sentences.cn: 我爱吃糖，可妈妈不让我常吃。

sentences.en: I shouldn't grumble about Mum — she's lovely really.
sentences.cn: 我不该抱怨妈妈——她真的很好。

sentences.en: I've asked Mum to sit for us next Saturday.
sentences.cn: 我已经拜托妈妈下周六为我们临时照看一下孩子。

sentences.en: In some cases there is a mini-mum age limit.
sentences.cn: 有些情况下有最低年龄限制。

sentences.en: Mum and he were able to walk part of the way together.
sentences.cn: 妈妈和他能够一起走一段路。

sentences.en: Mum and I used to fall out a lot.
sentences.cn: 我和妈妈过去经常争吵。

sentences.en: Mum was incensed at his lack of compassion.
sentences.cn: 妈妈被他缺乏同情心的表现激怒了。

sentences.en: Mum's the word on the surprise party.
sentences.cn: 在这个意外的集会上别多话

sentences.en: My mum used to help cook the meals for the children.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈过去常帮忙给孩子做饭。

sentences.en: Say what you like about them, but they did love their Mum.
sentences.cn: 随你怎么说，但他们确实爱自己的妈妈。

sentences.en: She scribbled a note to tell Mum she'dgone out.
sentences.cn: 她匆匆写了个便条告诉妈妈她已外出。

sentences.en: There are plenty of plus points about being an older first-time mum.
sentences.cn: 年龄稍长再做妈妈有很多好处。

words.tran_cn: 虚礼，哑剧；哑剧演员的表演

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（尤指为保密）保持沉默，守口如瓶
保密：保守你知道的秘密

trans.tran_cn: 妈妈，沉默，菊花，烈性啤酒
